pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
CESSNA 414 CHANCELLOR AILERON TRIM KNOB
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION "EXTERMINATE THE MICE FROM YOUR COCKPIT!" GitHub: https://simstrumentation.com
Aileron trim knob and indicator for the Cessna 414 Chancellow by FlySimware
NOTES: - Only guaranteed to work with the Flysimware Cessna 414 Chancellor. May work in other aircraft but compatibility not guaranteed. - Modelled after the instrument in the Flysimware C414AW
